name: BattleStarz
description:
BattleStarz is a 3D Top-Down, TwinStick, 1v1 Fighter, where you and your opponent play as gladiator ninjas. Players try to defeat eachother to become the biggest Ninja Star! Throw shuriken through portals and bounce them off walls in order to keep your opponent guessing, and move through portals to contest shuriken spawns to keep the fast paced gameplay flow!

(CONTROLLERS NEEDED, 2 PLAYERS ONLY)

Project created by:

Rogan Johnston (Project Manager)

Nic Seymour (Environment and Character Artist)

Sam English (Programmer)

Steven Liu (Level Designer)

Nicholas Perrott (Level Designer)
